nodes.text: Berandis was a male Human who served as the assistant manager of the Challabae Admits-No-Equal Aerial Eruptive Manufacturing Concern, a missile manufacturing plant on the planet Adumar. Berandis was in charge of public concerns for the company. In 13 ABY, Berandis gave a tour of the company's plant to Red Flight—a group of New Republic veteran pilots—during their diplomatic mission to Adumar.
